title: League Memory usage problems.
body: I notice while in game league generally uses 400,000k memory and everything runs smooth. But anytime I get lag it's using 1,000,000 k memory. Why is there a difference and can i do anything to stop this?

replies.body: I'm wondering if that could possibly be a sign that certain game files are damaged or corrupted. For instance, if the files for Baron were corrupted the game might *freak out* anytime those files are used, which might make that cpu usage spike. Let's run a quick repair and test it in a custom/practice game, and if that doesn't help go ahead and hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
